      • Cipher

        public Cipher​(java.lang.String text,
              java.lang.String[] keys,
              boolean backwards)
       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Constructs a new Cipher instance
        Parameters:
        text - the text to run the ciphers on
        keys - the keys to use for the ciphers
        backwards - decrypt instead of encrypt
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - unless all the keys only contain english letters
